law.catch_line: The seizing authority that seizes money that is contraband shall immediately:...

text.section:
The seizing authority that seizes money that is contraband shall immediately:
photograph the money and record the quantity of each denomination of coin or currency seized; and
deposit the money to the account of the financial authority.
A photograph taken under subsection (a) of this section may be substituted for money as evidence in a criminal or forfeiture proceeding.
